sentences.sContent: Deaf children can often be included in mainstream education.
sentences.sCn: 失聪儿童往往可以被纳入主流教育。

remMethod.val: main(主要的) + stream(溪， 流) → 主流， 主要趋势， 主要倾向

trans.tranOther: accepted by or involving most people in a society

trans.tranCn: 主要倾向，主要趋势，主流；主流派爵士乐
trans.tranOther: the most usual ideas or methods, or the people who have these ideas or methods
